member.name: CONTROLINFO
member.summary: Contains parameters that describe a control's keyboard mnemonics and keyboard behavior. The structure is populated during the method.

member.name: CONTROLINFO.cb
member.summary: The size of the structure, in bytes.

member.name: CONTROLINFO.hAccel
member.summary: A handle to an array of structures, each structure describing a keyboard mnemonic. The array is created with the function. The control always maintains the memory for this array; the caller of should not attempt to free the memory.

member.name: CONTROLINFO.cAccel
member.summary: The number of mnemonics described in the hAccel field. This value can be zero to indicate no mnemonics.

member.name: CONTROLINFO.dwFlags
member.summary:
Flags that indicate the keyboard behavior of the control. The possible values are:
CTRLINFO_EATS_RETURN: When the control has the focus, it will process the Return key.
CTRLINFO_EATS_ESCAPE: When the control has the focus, it will process the Escape key.
When the control has the focus, the dialog box containing the control cannot use the Return or Escape keys as mnemonics for the default and cancel buttons.
